Name: Heat and Run
About the game: Choose a hero/heroine and equip them with a potent relic. Master your special skills and the block's creation during intense 4v4 battles. Use your Glocktail and Dynameats to destroy your opponent's Flame! Dominate with your team by creating effective strategies. Create synergies with your heroes, organize your defense and coordinate your assaults! Discover a frantic 4vs4 gameplay: - 8 Heroes and Heroines. - 3 Relics to boost your Hero. - 2 Maps: Overgrown & Akona. - Classic and custom modes. - Customizable in-game controls. - Audio communication with the voices of the Heroes. - Bots filling empty games. - Friends and Teams system, instant messaging. - Individual leaderboard. We are already preparing updates for Early Access and Release 1.0: - Resolution of reported bugs, server stability. - More Heroes, Relics and Maps. - A Tutorial in three didactic phases. - New modes: spectator and ranked. - Win XP and Gold to advance in the game. - Cosmetics to be the most classy on the battlefield. Discover our roadmap at the top of the steam page and join our discord to help us develop Heat and Run: Share your opinions and bugs! If you are interested in the game, don’t forget to add it to your wishlist! ♥ /
